description: Puzzler Mind Gym 3D offers you a daily program of brain exercises and puzzles in 3D, designed to help you make the most of your mind. Improve your capabilities in four categories you use every day – Visual, Memorization, Word-based, and Numerical. Get grades and detailed statistics on your performance and monitor your results over time in the profile tracker. Brought to you by Puzzler, in conjunction with Professor Ian Robertson, an internationally recognized neuroscientist and expert on cognitive rehabilitation. Keep your brain active!
name: Puzzler Mind Gym® 3
disclaimer: Please use Parental Controls to restrict 3D access for children 6 and under.
